1.6.1.en: Added support for Gunnarp and Leptiter, fixed an issue with Signal Repeater, improved light behaviour related to onoff/dim actions in Flows and updated app descriptions.

1.7.0.en: Update to latest version of Homey Apps SDK.

1.7.1.en: Updated to the latest version of the Homey Apps SDK, added support for Wireless Dimmer, Motion Sensor, Remote Control (5-button), Up/Down Remote Control, and implemented various bug fixes and improvements.

1.7.2.en: Updated to the latest version of the Homey Apps SDK, added support for Wireless Dimmer, Motion Sensor, Remote Control (5-button), Up/Down Remote Control, and implemented various bug fixes and improvements.

1.7.3.en: Updated to the latest version of the Homey Apps SDK, added support for Wireless Dimmer, Motion Sensor, Remote Control (5-button), Up/Down Remote Control, changed the way color temperature is calculated, and implemented various bug fixes and improvements.

1.7.5.en: Updated to the latest version of the Homey Apps SDK, added support for Wireless Dimmer, Motion Sensor, Remote Control (5-button), Up/Down Remote Control, Tunable White Bulb E14 470lm, changed the way color temperature is calculated, and implemented various bug fixes and improvements.
